milestones.name: Steering Committee Established
milestones.description: Cross-functional steering committee formed with executive sponsor, project lead, and representatives from Finance, Risk, Compliance, Internal Audit, IT, Operations, Legal, and ESG.
successCriteria: Project lead appointed (CRO or Head of Risk)

milestones.name: Materiality Criteria Drafted
milestones.description: Initial materiality criteria developed combining quantitative thresholds and qualitative factors, ready for board review.
successCriteria: Quantitative thresholds defined (Â£X million, % of profit)
Decision tree created for edge cases

milestones.name: Material Control Inventory (MCI) Completed
milestones.description: Comprehensive list of 25-100 material controls identified through top-down risk mapping, documented with preliminary details.
successCriteria: All principal risks mapped to at least one control

milestones.name: Gap Assessment Finalised
milestones.description: Control coverage gaps identified, prioritised by risk severity, with high-level remediation roadmap developed.
successCriteria: All gaps documented with risk rating

milestones.name: BOARD APPROVAL OF MCI
milestones.description: Board formally approves materiality criteria and Material Control Inventory. Critical decision gate for Phase 2 commencement.
successCriteria: Budget and resources approved for Phase 2
goCriteria: Board formally approved MCI and criteria

milestones.name: Control Definitions Formalised
milestones.description: All material controls documented using standardised template including objective, design, frequency, and preliminary effectiveness criteria.
successCriteria: What, how, when, by whom specified

milestones.name: Effectiveness Criteria Defined
milestones.description: Measurable effectiveness criteria established for each material control with quantified thresholds and KPIs.

milestones.name: Framework Mapping Complete (COSO/ISO 31000)
milestones.description: All material controls mapped to relevant COSO component or ISO 31000 process category, demonstrating framework alignment.
successCriteria: Alignment with existing SOX controls (if applicable)

milestones.name: Testing Protocols Approved
milestones.description: Standardised testing methodologies defined by control type, including sample sizes, pass/fail criteria, and evidence requirements.
successCriteria: Testing methods documented by control type
Sample sizes and statistical approaches defined

milestones.name: CONTROL OWNERSHIP CONFIRMED
milestones.description: All control owners formally accept ownership with signed acknowledgement. Critical decision gate for Phase 3 commencement.
successCriteria: 100% of controls have named individual owners

milestones.name: Assurance Mapping Complete
milestones.description: Comprehensive assurance map created showing 1st, 2nd, and 3rd line coverage for each material control, with gaps identified.
successCriteria: All controls have assurance sources identified

milestones.name: Board Dashboard Tested
milestones.description: Executive dashboard ('Approach on a Page') developed and tested with sample data, ready for board review.
successCriteria: Dashboard includes Material Risks, Control Effectiveness, Assurance Coverage, Issues

milestones.name: First-Line Training Complete
milestones.description: All control owners trained on control execution, evidence collection, and self-assessment processes.
successCriteria: Training includes: Control objectives, execution, evidence, escalation
Training materials available for ongoing reference

milestones.name: Dry Run Commenced
milestones.description: 6-8 week pilot effectiveness assessment begins, simulating full control execution, testing, and board reporting cycle.

milestones.name: GRC Platform Go-Live
milestones.description: GRC technology platform fully deployed, integrated with business systems, and operational for control management.

milestones.name: DRY RUN SUCCESS & BOARD CONFIDENCE
milestones.description: Dry run completed, lessons learned documented, board reviews results and expresses confidence in FY2026 readiness. Critical decision gate for Phase 4.
milestones.decisionGate: Gate 3: Dry Run Success & Board Confidence
successCriteria: Dry run executed without major failures

milestones.name: Q1 FY2026 Board Dashboard Reviewed
milestones.description: First quarterly board dashboard for FY2026 presented to Audit Committee and Board, showing control effectiveness for Q1.
successCriteria: Dashboard shows all control testing results for Q1

milestones.name: Q2 FY2026 Board Dashboard Reviewed
milestones.description: Second quarterly board dashboard for FY2026 presented, showing half-year control effectiveness trends.
successCriteria: Any ineffective controls remediated or on track

milestones.name: Q3 FY2026 Board Dashboard Reviewed
milestones.description: Third quarterly board dashboard for FY2026 presented, with focus on year-end readiness and evidence completeness.

milestones.name: Internal Audit Framework Assurance Complete
milestones.description: Third line (Internal Audit) completes annual framework assurance, validating control design and operating effectiveness across all material controls.
successCriteria: All material controls reviewed by Internal Audit
Issues identified and communicated to management

milestones.name: Evidence Dossier Compiled
milestones.description: Comprehensive evidence dossier assembled containing full-year testing results, evidence artifacts, and assurance documentation.
successCriteria: Evidence for all controls for full FY2026

milestones.name: BOARD DECLARATION APPROVED
milestones.description: Board approves declaration of effectiveness (or explanation of ineffectiveness) for inclusion in 2026 annual report. Final decision gate.
declarationOptions: Full effectiveness: All material controls operating effectively
Effectiveness with exceptions: Controls effective except [X], which is subject to remediation
Ineffectiveness with remediation: Controls ineffective; remediation plan in progress
